question: What does HTML stand for?
Which CSS property is used to change text color?
Which tag is used to create a hyperlink in HTML?
Which JavaScript method is used to write to the browser console?
Which hook is used to handle state in a React functional component?
What is the default position value of a positioned element in CSS?
Which HTML element is used to define a table row?
What does DOM stand for in JavaScript?
In React, what is the virtual DOM?
options: A real copy of the DOM
An in-memory representation of the real DOM
answer: An in-memory representation of the real DOM
